mapper.select: select rb.id, rb.post_id, u.id as writer_id, u.user_name as writer_name, u.user_role, p.title, rb.reporter_id, (select user_name from user_tb where id = rb.reporter_id) as reporter_name, rb.report_img_url, rb.report_count, rb.report_date from (select max(id) as id, post_id, max(reporter_id) as reporter_id, max(report_date) as report_date, max(report_img_url) as report_img_url, count(post_id) as report_count from report_board group by post_id) rb join post p on rb.post_id = p.id join user_tb u on p.user_id = u.id order by report_count desc, report_date desc
SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM report_board GROUP BY post_id ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 1;

select rb.id, rb.post_id, u.id as writer_id, u.user_name as writer_name, u.user_role, p.title, rb.reporter_id, (select user_name from user_tb where id = rb.reporter_id) as reporter_name, rb.report_img_url, rb.report_count, rb.report_date from (select max(id) as id, post_id, max(reporter_id) as reporter_id, max(report_date) as report_date, max(report_img_url) as report_img_url, count(post_id) as report_count from report_board group by post_id) rb join post p on rb.post_id = p.id join user_tb u on p.user_id = u.id order by report_count desc, report_date desc limit #{offset}, #{size}
